name: Contagious Combat
description:
Controls: Space = Attack, wasd = Walk

Contagious Combat is an Upoming Zombie Survival RPG Like Game Made by One Person.

Kickstarter page will be open soon to allow help and support!

HOW TO PLAY

right click on ZIP file and extract, open the Contagious Combat Folder and double Click the .EXE file to open the game (THE GAME IS BEING MADE BY ONE PERSON AND IS UNFINISHED)
